text: Icing and anti-inflammatories will help  with  the pain and swelling. Vigorous massage  of  the knot  in  the muscle will help it  to  relax and ease the pain. Meanwhile, work  on  strengthening and stretching your hip, hamstring and lower-back muscles.  for  stretching, focus on the hamstring stretch, the hip and lower-back stretch, and the hamstring and back stretch. For strengthening, try side leg lifts.
